help:
• ls - show files in current directory
  • cat FILENAME - display FILENAME in window
  • cd DIRECTORY - move into DIRECTORY, or just 'cd' to return to home
  • history - see your command history
  • clear - clear current window
  • pwd - display current directory

nodemessage:
Nodemessage

This library allows you to query and chain commands to your local iMessage database. You can use it to, among other things:

  • Get all messages
  • Get messages containing a specified keyword
  • Get messages from a specified recipient
  • Get messages from a recipient containing specific keyword text
  • Get all contact recipients
  • Get data about a recipient with specified handle or ID
  • Get all message attachments
  • Get all message attachments from a specified recipient

Source Code
map:
Map

This application allows for you to view and edit personalized map markers according to a series of predetermined categories

Current categories include:

  • Restaurants
  • Coffee
  • Nightlife
  • Landmarks
  • Key Locations

Source CodeDemo
dotify:
Dotify

A command-line tool that assists in the installation of dotfiles as you set up a new computer or simply seek to make your existing system better, and contains:

  • zsh installation and default setup
  • Bundled installation of brew, node, & ruby
  • A series of optionally installable npm modules
  • A series of optionally installable brew & brew cask packages
  • A series of optionally installable ruby gems
  • Simple set of terminal aliases and functions
  • Global gitconfig credentials and handy set of git aliases

Source Code
slack_automation:
Slack Automation

An application that automates signups to a slack group.

  • Ideal for communities, where members have different email domains
  • Allows for connection to Airtable, with collection of data fields
Source CodeDemo
